title: New: Niv Ast – I Don't Care
body:
Tel Aviv based producer/singer-songwriter [**Niv Ast**](https://www.

facebook.com/nivastmusic?ref=br_tf) opens the door to his forthcoming album with the noir electronic pop melodies of **I Don’t Care**. Lushly dark yet romantic falsetto, the erotic sax sounds of a rainy Metropolis and the overwhelming groove of a heartbreaking symphony, [**Niv Ast**](https://www.facebook.com/nivastmusic?ref=br_tf) shows his enormous talent within these three minutes. Check out I Don’t Care below, and keep your eyes open for bigger things to come.
